title: Sturdy Sans Serif
content:
Hi,

I was wondering if anybody knows what the typeface in this picture is (the sans serif in caps, the other one is Sabon). I can't seem to find it or anything similar.

Thank you very much in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831035544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5762.jpg)
author: Nicord
